data.eml:eml: Nineteen new genera and 82 new species of Cremnorrhinina from Australia, including analyses of host relationships and distributions (Insecta: Hemiptera: Miridae: Phylininae: Cremnorrhinini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Randall T. Schuh, Michael D. Schwartz (2016): Nineteen new genera and 82 new species of Cremnorrhinina from Australia, including analyses of host relationships and distributions (Insecta: Hemiptera: Miridae: Phylininae: Cremnorrhinini). Bulletin of the American Museum of Natural History 401: 1-279, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.269465, Hdl: http://hdl.handle.net/2246/6649
